plugin.name: font-awesome-resources
plugin.author: Eamonn O'Connell
plugin.title: Grails Font Awesome Resources Plugin
plugin.description: Like the jquery-resources plugin that pulls in the jquery javascript lib as a resource, this plugin pulls in Font Awesome. Font Awesome is a very popular font based icon set. Font based icons are a very convenient means of incorporating icons into a web application and the technique is growing in popularity. Font Awesome probably works best when used with the twitter bootstrap UI framework for which it was designed.
